          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading strategies:Guessing the main idea of the paragraph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert strategies:Guessing der Grundgedanke des
Paragraphen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lecture strategies:Guessing l'idée principale du
paragraphe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leitura strategies:Guessing a idéia principal do
parágrafo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettura strategies:Guessing l'idea principale del
paragrafo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάγνωση strategies:Guessing η βασική ιδέα της 
παραγράφου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lectura strategies:Guessing la idea principal del
párrafo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a work sheet where the student is asked questions about the main idea of several Paragraphs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">main ideas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interpretation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Arbeit Blatt, in dem dem 
Kursteilnehmer Fragen über den Grundgedanken einiger Paragraphen 
gestellt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une feuille de travail où on pose 
l'étudiant des questions sur l'idée principale de plusieurs 
paragraphes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha do trabalho onde o estudante 
seja perguntado sobre a idéia principal de diversos parágrafos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio del lavoro in cui all'allievo 
è fatta le domande riguardo all'idea principale di parecchi 
paragrafi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου ο σπουδαστής 
υποβάλλεται τις ερωτήσεις για τη βασική ιδέα διάφορων 
παραγράφων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja del trabajo donde interroguan el
estudiante acerca de la idea principal de varios párrafos.</string>
          </description>
